epics.title: Task Management Core Functionality
epics.description: Develop the core features of the To-Do List application, enabling users to add, edit, mark as completed, and delete tasks. This epic is critical to deliver the main business value: allowing users to efficiently manage their daily tasks.

stories.title: Add New Task
stories.description: As a user, I want to add a new task with a title and optional description so that I can keep track of things I need to do.

subtasks.title: Design Add Task UI
subtasks.description: Create wireframes and UI components for the add task form, ensuring accessibility and responsiveness.

subtasks.title: Implement Add Task Functionality (Frontend)
subtasks.description: Develop the frontend logic to capture user input and trigger task creation.

subtasks.title: Implement Add Task API (Backend)
subtasks.description: Create backend endpoint to accept new task data and store it in the database.

subtasks.title: Test Add Task Feature
subtasks.description: Write and execute test cases to verify task creation, validation, and error handling.

stories.title: Edit Task
stories.description: As a user, I want to edit an existing task's title or description so that I can update my tasks as needed.

subtasks.title: Design Edit Task UI
subtasks.description: Create UI for editing tasks, including modal or inline editing options.

subtasks.title: Implement Edit Task Functionality (Frontend)
subtasks.description: Develop frontend logic to allow users to edit and save changes to tasks.

subtasks.title: Implement Edit Task API (Backend)
subtasks.description: Create backend endpoint to update task details in the database.

subtasks.title: Test Edit Task Feature
subtasks.description: Write and execute test cases for editing tasks, including validation and error handling.

stories.title: Mark Task as Completed
stories.description: As a user, I want to mark a task as completed so that I can track my progress.

subtasks.title: Design Completed Task UI
subtasks.description: Design visual indicators for completed tasks (e.g., strikethrough, color change).

subtasks.title: Implement Mark as Completed (Frontend)
subtasks.description: Develop frontend logic to toggle task completion status.

subtasks.title: Implement Mark as Completed API (Backend)
subtasks.description: Create backend endpoint to update task completion status.

subtasks.title: Test Mark as Completed Feature
subtasks.description: Write and execute test cases for marking tasks as completed and uncompleted.

stories.title: Delete Task
stories.description: As a user, I want to delete a task so that I can remove tasks I no longer need.

subtasks.title: Design Delete Task UI
subtasks.description: Design delete button and confirmation dialog for task deletion.

subtasks.title: Implement Delete Task Functionality (Frontend)
subtasks.description: Develop frontend logic to trigger task deletion and update the UI.

subtasks.title: Implement Delete Task API (Backend)
subtasks.description: Create backend endpoint to delete tasks from the database.

subtasks.title: Test Delete Task Feature
subtasks.description: Write and execute test cases for deleting tasks and handling errors.

epics.title: Task List Display and User Experience
epics.description: Implement the task list display and ensure a responsive, intuitive user experience across desktop and mobile browsers. This epic ensures users can easily view and interact with their tasks.

stories.title: Display All Tasks in a List
stories.description: As a user, I want to see all my tasks in a list so that I can easily review and manage them.

subtasks.title: Design Task List UI
subtasks.description: Create wireframes and UI components for the task list, ensuring clarity and accessibility.

subtasks.title: Implement Task List Rendering (Frontend)
subtasks.description: Develop frontend logic to render the task list and update it dynamically.

subtasks.title: Implement Get Tasks API (Backend)
subtasks.description: Create backend endpoint to fetch all tasks from the database.

subtasks.title: Test Task List Display
subtasks.description: Write and execute test cases for task list rendering and real-time updates.

stories.title: Responsive Design for Desktop and Mobile
stories.description: As a user, I want the app to work seamlessly on both desktop and mobile browsers so that I can manage tasks from any device.

subtasks.title: Design Responsive Layout
subtasks.description: Create responsive design mockups for key screens.

subtasks.title: Implement Responsive Styles
subtasks.description: Develop CSS and frontend logic to ensure responsive behavior.

subtasks.title: Test Responsiveness
subtasks.description: Test app on various devices and browsers for responsive design compliance.

stories.title: User Experience and Accessibility Enhancements
stories.description: As a user, I want the app to be easy to use and accessible so that everyone can manage their tasks efficiently.

subtasks.title: Accessibility Audit
subtasks.description: Review UI components for accessibility compliance.

subtasks.title: Implement Accessibility Improvements
subtasks.description: Add ARIA labels, focus indicators, and keyboard navigation support.

subtasks.title: Accessibility Testing
subtasks.description: Test app for accessibility using screen readers and keyboard navigation.

stories.title: Performance Optimization
stories.description: As a user, I want the app to load quickly (within 3 seconds) so that I can access my tasks without delay.

subtasks.title: Optimize Frontend Assets
subtasks.description: Minify and bundle JS/CSS, optimize images, and implement lazy loading where appropriate.

subtasks.title: Optimize Backend Performance
subtasks.description: Ensure backend APIs respond quickly and efficiently.

subtasks.title: Performance Testing
subtasks.description: Test app load times and optimize as needed.

epics.title: Infrastructure, Deployment, and Quality Assurance
epics.description: Set up the technical infrastructure, deployment pipelines, and quality assurance processes to ensure the To-Do List app is robust, maintainable, and easy to deploy.

stories.title: Set Up Development and Production Environments
stories.description: As a developer, I want reliable environments for development, testing, and production so that the app can be built, tested, and deployed efficiently.

subtasks.title: Provision Cloud Infrastructure
subtasks.description: Set up cloud resources (e.g., hosting, database, storage) for all environments.

subtasks.title: Configure CI/CD Pipeline
subtasks.description: Implement continuous integration and deployment pipeline for automated builds and deployments.

subtasks.title: Manage Environment Variables
subtasks.description: Set up secure management of environment variables for all environments.

stories.title: Automated Testing and Quality Assurance
stories.description: As a QA engineer, I want automated tests for all core features so that regressions are caught early and the app remains stable.

subtasks.title: Write Unit Tests
subtasks.description: Develop unit tests for frontend and backend business logic.

subtasks.title: Write Integration Tests
subtasks.description: Develop integration tests for API endpoints.

subtasks.title: Write End-to-End Tests
subtasks.description: Develop end-to-end tests for main user flows using a tool like Cypress or Selenium.

stories.title: Product Management and Documentation
stories.description: As a product manager, I want clear documentation and project tracking so that the team can deliver on time and stakeholders are informed.

subtasks.title: Create Project Plan and Timeline
subtasks.description: Document project milestones, deliverables, and estimated timelines.

subtasks.title: Write Feature Documentation
subtasks.description: Document all features, user stories, and acceptance criteria.

subtasks.title: Publish Release Notes
subtasks.description: Prepare and distribute release notes for each app version.

stories.title: Security and Compliance Review
stories.description: As an IT/security specialist, I want to ensure the app follows security best practices and complies with relevant standards.

subtasks.title: Conduct Security Audit
subtasks.description: Review codebase and infrastructure for security vulnerabilities.

subtasks.title: Update Dependencies
subtasks.description: Ensure all libraries and dependencies are up to date.

subtasks.title: Document Data Privacy Practices
subtasks.description: Document how user data is handled and stored.
